storyTitle: As Scheduling Manager, I want to view employee schedules in a calendar format to easily understand shift assignments

testCases.title: Display schedules in weekly calendar view
preconditions: User is logged in as Scheduling Manager
User has role-based access to view employee schedules
At least one employee schedule exists in the system for the current week
Calendar UI component is functional and accessible

steps.action: Navigate to the schedule calendar page from the main menu
steps.expectedResult: Calendar page loads successfully and displays the current week view by default with all scheduled shifts visible

steps.action: Locate and click on the employee filter dropdown
steps.expectedResult: Employee filter dropdown opens and displays a list of all employees

steps.action: Select a specific employee from the filter dropdown
steps.expectedResult: Calendar updates immediately to show only the selected employee's shifts for the current week, other employees' shifts are hidden

steps.action: Click on one of the displayed shifts in the calendar
steps.expectedResult: A shift details popup appears displaying complete shift information including employee name, shift time, shift template, and any additional notes

steps.action: Close the shift details popup
steps.expectedResult: Popup closes and calendar view remains filtered to the selected employee

postconditions: Calendar remains in weekly view with employee filter applied
No data is modified in the system
User session remains active

testCases.title: Highlight scheduling conflicts in calendar
preconditions: User is logged in as Scheduling Manager
User has role-based access to view employee schedules
At least one employee has overlapping shifts assigned in the system
Calendar view is accessible and functional
Conflict highlighting feature is enabled

steps.action: Navigate to the schedule calendar page
steps.expectedResult: Calendar page loads successfully displaying the current week view

steps.action: Locate the employee with overlapping shifts in the calendar view
steps.expectedResult: The overlapping shifts are visually highlighted with a distinct color or border (e.g., red border or warning icon) to indicate a scheduling conflict

steps.action: Hover over or click on one of the conflicting shifts
steps.expectedResult: Shift details popup displays with conflict information clearly indicated, showing the overlapping time periods and affected shifts

steps.action: Verify that non-conflicting shifts are displayed normally without highlighting
steps.expectedResult: Non-conflicting shifts appear in standard display format without conflict indicators

postconditions: Scheduling conflicts remain highlighted in the calendar
No schedule data is modified
Conflict information is accurately displayed
User can proceed to resolve conflicts if needed

storyTitle: As Scheduling Manager, I want to modify existing employee schedules to accommodate changes

testCases.title: Modify employee schedule and log changes
preconditions: User is logged in as Scheduling Manager
User has role-based access to modify employee schedules
At least one employee schedule exists in the system
Audit logging functionality is enabled and operational
Database connection to EmployeeSchedules and AuditLogs is active

steps.action: Navigate to the employee schedules page and locate an existing employee schedule
steps.expectedResult: Employee schedules list is displayed with all available schedules

steps.action: Click on a specific employee schedule to select it
steps.expectedResult: Schedule details are displayed showing current shift times, employee information, and shift template

steps.action: Click the 'Edit' button or icon to enter edit mode
steps.expectedResult: Schedule enters edit mode with editable fields for shift times and other modifiable attributes

steps.action: Modify the shift start time and end time to new valid values
steps.expectedResult: New time values are accepted and displayed in the input fields without validation errors

steps.action: Click the 'Save' button to save the changes
steps.expectedResult: Changes are saved successfully, confirmation message is displayed, and schedule is updated with new shift times

steps.action: Navigate to the audit log section or page
steps.expectedResult: Audit log page loads displaying recent system activities

steps.action: Search or filter for the modification entry related to the edited schedule
steps.expectedResult: Audit log entry is found and displayed showing the schedule modification with complete details

steps.action: Verify the audit log entry contains the username of the logged-in manager and timestamp of the modification
steps.expectedResult: Log entry displays correct username, accurate timestamp, old values, new values, and modification type

postconditions: Employee schedule is updated with new shift times
Audit log contains complete record of the modification
Original schedule data is preserved in audit history
System remains in stable state ready for additional modifications

testCases.title: Send notification after schedule change
preconditions: User is logged in as Scheduling Manager
User has role-based access to modify employee schedules
At least one employee schedule exists in the system
Employee has valid contact information (email or app notification settings) configured
Notification service is operational and connected
Employee is set to receive schedule change notifications

steps.action: Navigate to the employee schedules page and select an existing employee schedule
steps.expectedResult: Schedule details are displayed for the selected employee

steps.action: Click the 'Edit' button to enter edit mode
steps.expectedResult: Schedule enters edit mode with editable fields available

steps.action: Modify the schedule by changing shift times or other schedule attributes that affect the employee
steps.expectedResult: Modified values are accepted and displayed in the input fields

steps.action: Click the 'Save' button to save the schedule changes
steps.expectedResult: Changes are saved successfully, confirmation message is displayed, and notification is triggered to the affected employee

steps.action: Navigate to the notifications management section or notification status page
steps.expectedResult: Notifications page loads displaying recent notification activities

steps.action: Search or filter for the notification sent to the affected employee regarding the schedule change
steps.expectedResult: Notification record is found and displayed in the notifications list

steps.action: Verify the notification status shows as 'Delivered' or 'Sent'
steps.expectedResult: Notification status is marked as 'Delivered' with timestamp, recipient information, and notification content details visible

steps.action: Optionally verify the employee received the notification through their email or app
steps.expectedResult: Employee has received the notification with accurate schedule change information

postconditions: Employee schedule is updated with modifications
Notification is successfully sent and marked as delivered
Notification record is stored in the system
Employee is informed of the schedule change
System is ready to process additional schedule modifications

storyTitle: As Scheduling Manager, I want to receive notifications for schedule changes to keep employees informed

testCases.title: Send notification on schedule creation
preconditions: User is logged in as Scheduling Manager
Notification service is configured and operational
At least one employee exists in the system with valid contact information
Email and/or app notification channels are enabled
Employee has valid email address and/or app access

steps.action: Navigate to the schedule management interface
steps.expectedResult: Schedule management page is displayed with options to create new schedules

steps.action: Click on 'Create New Schedule' button
steps.expectedResult: Schedule creation form is displayed with all required fields

steps.action: Fill in schedule details including employee name, date, time, and shift information
steps.expectedResult: All schedule fields are populated with valid data

steps.action: Click 'Save' or 'Create Schedule' button
steps.expectedResult: Schedule is successfully created and saved to the system

steps.action: Verify notification is triggered in the system logs or notification dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Notification event is logged showing trigger timestamp and recipient details

steps.action: Check employee's email inbox for notification
steps.expectedResult: Email notification is received containing schedule details, date, time, and shift information

steps.action: Check employee's app for push notification or in-app message
steps.expectedResult: App notification is received with schedule creation details and relevant information

steps.action: Verify notification content includes all relevant schedule information
steps.expectedResult: Notification displays employee name, schedule date, shift time, location, and any additional notes

postconditions: New schedule is created and stored in the database
Notification is successfully delivered to employee via configured channels
Notification delivery status is recorded as 'Sent' or 'Delivered'
Employee is informed of their new schedule assignment

testCases.title: Track and resend failed notifications
preconditions: User is logged in as Scheduling Manager
Notification service is configured
At least one schedule with notification exists in the system
Manager has access to notification status dashboard
System has capability to simulate or trigger notification failures

steps.action: Navigate to the notification status dashboard or monitoring page
steps.expectedResult: Notification tracking interface is displayed showing list of sent notifications

steps.action: Simulate a notification failure by disabling email service or using invalid employee email address
steps.expectedResult: Notification service encounters delivery failure condition

steps.action: Create or modify a schedule to trigger notification
steps.expectedResult: System attempts to send notification but encounters failure

steps.action: Check the notification status dashboard for the failed notification
steps.expectedResult: Notification status is displayed as 'Failed' with failure reason and timestamp

steps.action: Verify failure details include error message and affected employee information
steps.expectedResult: Dashboard shows specific error details such as 'Email delivery failed', 'Invalid email address', or 'Service unavailable'

steps.action: Resolve the issue causing failure (e.g., correct email address, re-enable service)
steps.expectedResult: Underlying issue is corrected and notification channel is operational

steps.action: Select the failed notification from the list
steps.expectedResult: Failed notification is highlighted and resend option is available

steps.action: Click 'Resend Notification' or 'Retry' button
steps.expectedResult: System initiates resend process and displays confirmation message

steps.action: Monitor notification status for the resent notification
steps.expectedResult: Notification status updates to 'Sending' then 'Sent' or 'Delivered'

steps.action: Verify employee receives the resent notification via configured channel
steps.expectedResult: Employee successfully receives notification via email or app with correct schedule information

steps.action: Check notification history to confirm resend attempt is logged
steps.expectedResult: Notification history shows both original failed attempt and successful resend with timestamps

postconditions: Failed notification is tracked and logged in the system
Notification is successfully resent and delivered to employee
Notification status is updated to 'Delivered' or 'Sent'
Complete audit trail of notification attempts is maintained
Employee receives schedule information despite initial failure
